summary: A meeting point if you play with a guild mod.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][size=6][b]Guildhouse[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4]A house for your guildmembers or your followers.[/size]
[size=4]A meeting point if you play with a guild mod.[/size]

[color=#ff7700][size=3][b]Location: West of the Solitude Sawmill (At the sea-side).[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4]Go to the Solitude Sawmill then turn west for discovering.[/size]

[color=#00ff00][size=3][b]Inside[/b][/size][/color]
[size=4]Small pool (not for swimming).[/size]
[size=4]Shrine of Nocturnal Statue in the middle of the pool.[/size]
[size=4]Bookcases, chest, strong box and other storages.[/size]
[size=4]Benches, chairs and tables.[/size]
[size=4]Bar (There's no bartender).[/size]
[size=4]10 single beds for guildmembers or your followers.[/size]
[size=4]Idle markers for followers or guildmembers.[/size]

[color=#00ff00][size=3][b]For Player[/b][/size][/color]
[size=4]Bedroom,[/size]
[size=4]Doublebed,[/size]
[size=4]Bookcases,[/size]
[size=4]Chest, etc...[/size]

[size=3][color=#00ff00][b]For crafting [/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b]inside[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4]Alchemy Lab,[/size]
[size=4]Anvil,[/size]
[size=4]Arcane Enchanter,[/size]
[size=4]Cooking Pot,[/size]
[size=4]Grindstone,[/size]
[size=4]Tanning Rack,[/size]
[size=4]Workbench.[/size]

[color=#00ff00][size=3][b]Outside[/b][/size][/color]
[size=4]Arbor,[/size]
[size=4]Bench, chairs and tables.[/size]
[size=4]Some crafting units.[/size]
[size=4]Map marker. You can fast travel after discovering.[/size]
[size=4]Idle markers for followers or guildmembers.[/size]

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21386819?tab=user+files][size=4]MY MODS[/size][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21386819/?tb=mods&pUp=1]
[/url]
author: cengo
